installation_location.institute: Institute for Manufacturing Technology and Production Systems (FBK)

research_context.project: TRR 375 HyPo - Multifunctional high-performance components from hybrid porous materials
research_context.subproject: B01 - Laser directed energy deposition of functionally graded materials on porous metals

wavelength_classification.safety_classification: Class 4 laser (assumed based on power level)
wavelength_classification.note: Comparable laser types listed for reference in literature searches for absorptivity data. Absorptivity values at these wavelengths are generally applicable to 1080 nm.

notes.beam_quality_interpretation: Beam quality M² can be calculated from beam parameter product. Lower BPP values indicate better beam quality (more focusable beam).
notes.wavelength_range: The ±20 nm tolerance means actual emission wavelength during operation falls within 1060-1100 nm range.
notes.diode_laser_characteristics: Fiber-coupled diode lasers typically offer high electrical efficiency, reliability, and compact design compared to other industrial laser types.
notes.data_integrity: All values in this file are directly quoted from peer-reviewed publications authored by research group members at FBK RPTU. No estimated or assumed values are included.
